basic.Target Organism: [Ref.32971824] Gram-negative bacteria:E.coli (IC50 = 1.20 ± 0.10 μM, MBC = 2.0 μM), S. Typhimurium (IC50 = 1.30 ± 0.14	μM, MBC = 2.5 μM);Gram-positive bacteria:S. aureus (IC50 = 1.98 ± 0.25 μM, MBC = 16.0 μM), L. monocytogenes (IC50 = 0.46 ± 0.01 μM, MBC = 2.0 μM);Fungi:C. albicans ATCC 14053, A. brasiliensis ATCC 9341. Susceptibility testing clearly showed that RiLK1 was very effective, being able to inhibit 100% growth of both fungi at 25 μM concentration (MFC).
